content:
This PR #15637 has been stable for some time now. I have a few other results dependent on this one. It'd be great if a maintainer can take a final look.

It adds the following theorems about convex cones:

  • hyperplane_separation_point_nonempty_closed_convex_cone and
  • inner_dual_cone_of_inner_dual_cone_eq_self
    (in addition to a few minor ones).

Thanks,
Thanks for this work. I just reviewed and delegated. Please don't forget to update the PR title + description as it looks out of date.
